title: amplification attacks
extract: An Amplification Attack is any attack where an attacker is able to use an amplification factor to multiply its power. ... Examples of amplification attacks include Smurf Attacks (ICMP amplification), Fraggle Attacks (UDP amplification), and DNS Amplification.
extract_html: An Amplification Attack is any attack where an attacker is able to use an amplification factor to multiply its power. ... Examples of amplification attacks include Smurf Attacks (ICMP amplification), Fraggle Attacks (UDP amplification), and DNS Amplification.
